articles.author: Kana Inagaki
articles.title: Japanese workers secure biggest pay rise in three decades - Financial Times
articles.description: Wage increase underlines inflationary trend and bolsters case for Bank of Japan to begin raising interest rates
articles.content: Japanese companies including Honda, Nippon Steel and ANA Holdings have granted workers their biggest pay rise in more than three decades, underlining the inflationary trend and bolstering the case fo… [+4430 chars]
